1.title: The Beginning
1.plot: In this tragic world, Tzivana suddenly discovers that her beloved Andreas hasn't just changed his name but his whole beingness. In these five minutes of anguish and heartbreak, the prevailing message is that no matter the way out of the labyrinths of life, one never ceases to ululate.

2.title: The Return of Tzivana
2.plot: Two years ago we met a couple that was not alike any other couple; that fate has been unkind to and was destined to touch even the coldest of hearts. Tzivana and Andreas, the tragic characters of 'Luggage' that shook up the Greek nation with their choices, which weren't always actuated by their best interest, but also love. How did that love affect Tzivana though? The heroes of this legendary story return, but this time more aware and more...TRANSFORMED.

3.title: The Accident
3.plot: This time our tragic characters transcend themselves turning things upside down, blindly driven by the common denominator that pulls the strings: love - or is it something deeper; darker? In the third installment of 'I Aposkevi' we'll infiltrate our heroes' psyche and see though the lipstick, the high heel, the sagging dewlap - Will we be able to indulge in their raw, unadulterated emotions, which like rough-cut diamonds laid on the ground waiting the slightest ray of sunshine to light up their souls? A ray of sunshine that will rekindle Tzivana and Andreas' eternal ...

4.title: The Wedding
4.plot: Once upon a time, in those days that love was simpler, more honest, with no cinematic drama and hashtags, two younglings swore everlasting devotion to one another and promised that they'll love each other no matter what. Tzivana kept her promise and notwithstanding the obstacles that the wheel of fortune brought upon her, accepted Andreas and with patience, persistence and after two gender reassignments, managed to win back the love of her life. However, the unfair game of destiny makes history repeat itself, but this time with different leads - The tragic heroes of ...

5.title: Apocalypse
5.plot: Roz Akrides make a comeback to big screen with the all star cast of 'Aposkevi 5: The Apocalypse'. Get ready for the most shattering sequel of your favorite family drama. The suspense has skyrocketed and the time has come for questions that torment mankind since ancient times to be answered. What is Betty after all? What will happen to Tzivana's unfathomable love for Andreas? Will the latter one remain female? Stay tuned keeping tranquilizers handy - Because your life will never be the same ever again.

imdb.title: I Aposkevi
plot: In this tragic world, Tzivana suddenly discovers that her beloved Andreas hasn't just changed his name but his whole existence.
